vulnerabilities.name: Session Fixation
vulnerabilities.evidence: Server accepted and maintained the injected session ID 'ScannerTestFixation123' after login.
vulnerabilities.request:
POST http://localhost/login.php
User-Agent: python-requests/2.32.5
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, zstd
Accept: */*
Connection: keep-alive
Cookie: PHPSESSID=ScannerTestFixation123; JSESSIONID=ScannerTestFixation123
Content-Length: 32
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded

username=admin&password=password
vulnerabilities.response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Date: Fri, 20 Feb 2026 13:00:50 GMT Server: Apache/2.4.25 (Debian) Expires: Tue, 23 Jun 2009 12:00:00 GMT Cache-Control: no-cache, must-revalidate Pragma: no-cache Set-Cookie: PHPSESSID=ScannerTestFixation123; path=/, security=low Vary: Accept-Encoding Content-Encoding: gzip Content-Length: 697 Keep-Alive: timeout=5, max=100 Connection: Keep-Alive Content-Type: text/html;charset=utf-8 Login :: Damn Vulnerable Web Application (DVWA) v1.10 *Development*














Damn Vulnerable Web Application (DVWA)

vulnerabilities.name: Authentication Weakness
vulnerabilities.evidence: No rate limiting (HTTP 429) or lockout detected after multiple rapid failed login attempts.
vulnerabilities.request:
POST http://localhost/login.php
User-Agent: python-requests/2.32.5
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, zstd
Accept: */*
Connection: keep-alive
Cookie: PHPSESSID=76e26hn8tdhjm2cpcdvisqnjd4; security=low
Content-Length: 67
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded

username=scanner_audit_nonexistent_user&password=wrong_password_123
vulnerabilities.response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Date: Fri, 20 Feb 2026 13:00:50 GMT Server: Apache/2.4.25 (Debian) Expires: Tue, 23 Jun 2009 12:00:00 GMT Cache-Control: no-cache, must-revalidate Pragma: no-cache Vary: Accept-Encoding Content-Encoding: gzip Content-Length: 699 Keep-Alive: timeout=5, max=96 Connection: Keep-Alive Content-Type: text/html;charset=utf-8 Login :: Damn Vulnerable Web Application (DVWA) v1.10 *Development*














Damn Vulnerable Web Application (DVWA)

vulnerabilities.name: Clickjacking (UI Redressing)
vulnerabilities.evidence: Missing or invalid X-Frame-Options header. Missing frame-ancestors in Content-Security-Policy.
vulnerabilities.request:
GET http://localhost/login.php
User-Agent: python-requests/2.32.5
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, zstd
Accept: */*
Connection: keep-alive
Cookie: PHPSESSID=a97f6hah0q754jprl1akskdbf6; security=low
vulnerabilities.response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Date: Fri, 20 Feb 2026 13:00:51 GMT Server: Apache/2.4.25 (Debian) Expires: Tue, 23 Jun 2009 12:00:00 GMT Cache-Control: no-cache, must-revalidate Pragma: no-cache Vary: Accept-Encoding Content-Encoding: gzip Content-Length: 742 Keep-Alive: timeout=5, max=73 Connection: Keep-Alive Content-Type: text/html;charset=utf-8 Login :: Damn Vulnerable Web Application (DVWA) v1.10 *Development*

vulnerabilities.name: Missing Content Security Policy (CSP)
vulnerabilities.evidence: The response does not include a Content-Security-Policy header, increasing the risk of XSS and data injection.
vulnerabilities.request:
GET http://localhost/login.php
User-Agent: python-requests/2.32.5
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, zstd
Accept: */*
Connection: keep-alive
Cookie: PHPSESSID=a97f6hah0q754jprl1akskdbf6; security=low
vulnerabilities.response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Date: Fri, 20 Feb 2026 13:00:51 GMT Server: Apache/2.4.25 (Debian) Expires: Tue, 23 Jun 2009 12:00:00 GMT Cache-Control: no-cache, must-revalidate Pragma: no-cache Vary: Accept-Encoding Content-Encoding: gzip Content-Length: 696 Keep-Alive: timeout=5, max=99 Connection: Keep-Alive Content-Type: text/html;charset=utf-8 Login :: Damn Vulnerable Web Application (DVWA) v1.10 *Development*

vulnerabilities.name: Sensitive File Exposure
vulnerabilities.evidence:
Found accessible file 'robots.txt' with status 200. Content snippet: User-agent: *
Disallow: /...
vulnerabilities.request:
GET http://localhost/robots.txt
User-Agent: python-requests/2.32.5
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, zstd
Accept: */*
Connection: keep-alive
Cookie: PHPSESSID=a97f6hah0q754jprl1akskdbf6; security=low
vulnerabilities.response:

Date: Fri, 20 Feb 2026 13:00:53 GMT

ETag: "1a-5780ba3955700"
Accept-Ranges: bytes
Content-Length: 26
Keep-Alive: timeout=5, max=54
Connection: Keep-Alive
Content-Type: text/plain

User-agent: *
Disallow: /
